message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $95?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to go that low. I can do $105, which is a good compromise. What do you think?
